summary.span: 提供管理 对象集合的方法。

span.span: Provides methods to manage a collection of objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常由其他控件，如， ，或。 is typically used by other controls, such as the , , or . 您可以添加位图或图标到，并且能够使用的映像，因为它们需要其他控件。You can add bitmaps or icons to the , and the other controls are able to use the images as they require. 使用一个句柄来管理映像的列表。 uses a handle to manage the list of images. 创建某些操作，如获取或调用，图像列表上执行。The is not created until certain operations, such as getting the or calling , are performed on the image list. 在执行其他操作，例如设置或将导致无法重新创建它。Performing other operations, such as setting the or will cause the to be recreated. 因此，应执行这些操作添加到映像之前。Therefore, you should perform these operations before you add images to the . 此外，当您处理将本地化的窗体，则应始终添加和图像时窗体的语言属性设置为默认值。In addition, when you work with forms that will be localized, you should always add an and images when the Language property of a form is set to Default. 在添加映像会损坏应用程序资源文件之前，请更改窗体的语言。Changing the form's language before you add images will corrupt the application resource files. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示如何选择、 删除和显示图像。The following code example shows how to select, remove, and display images. [!code-cpp[Classic ImageList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ImageList Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ImageList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ImageList Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ImageList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ImageList Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |项Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||在 .NET Framework 1.0 版本中，默认值为 。In the .NET Framework version 1.0, the default is . 在 .NET Framework 1.1 或更高版本中，默认值为 。In the .NET Framework version 1.1 or later, the default is .| ||默认值是具有高度和宽度的 16 × 16 对象。The default is a object with a height and width of 16 by 16.| ||默认值为 。The default value is .| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造，添加到图像属性，设置属性，并使用方法。The following code example demonstrates constructing an , adding images to the property, setting the property, and using the method. 若要运行此示例中，将其放在包含名为的按钮的窗体`Button1`。To run this example, place it in a form containing a button named `Button1`. 该示例假定存在`FeatherTexture.bmp`并`Gone Fishing.bmp`在 c:\Windows\\。The example assumes the existence of `FeatherTexture.bmp` and `Gone Fishing.bmp` at c:\Windows\\. 如果位图不存在于您的系统，或者在另一个位置存在，请相应地更改该示例。Change the example accordingly if the bitmaps do not exist on your system, or exist at another location. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，将它与一个容器关联起来。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, associating it with a container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数，可将相关联任何对象。The constructor enables you to associate a with any object. 通过将相关联像这样，您的生命周期的控制权移交到。By associating the like this, you hand over control of the lifetime of the to the . 如果你在应用程序中使用多个组件，并想要同时释放它们，这很有用。This can be useful if you use a number of components in your application, and want to dispose of all of them simultaneously. 例如，如果您将相关联、 一个，和一个与，则调用在容器上强制的所有这些组件也可供使用。For example, if you associate a , an , and a with a , calling on the Container will force disposal of all of these components as well.

value.span: 在 .NET Framework 1.1 或更高版本中，默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为新值，设置颜色深度时列表重新创建映像。When you set the color depth to a new value, the for the image list is recreated. 因为设置属性将导致句柄无法重新创建它，应设置之前设置属性。Because setting the property causes the handle to be recreated, you should set prior to setting the property. 时的句柄创建后，设置或在代码中之后设置, 的属性属性，将导致为设置的图像集合要删除的属性。When the handle for the has been created, setting the or properties in code, after setting the property, will cause the collection of images set for the property to be deleted.

summary.span: 获取或设置图像列表中的图像大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the images in the image list.

value.span: 定义列表中的图像高度和宽度（以像素为单位）的 。

span.span: The that defines the height and width, in pixels, of the images in the list.
The default size is 16 by 16.
The maximum size is 256 by 256.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性，然后将映像添加到图像集合会将图像大小调整为指定的图像大小。Setting the property prior to adding images to the image collection causes the images to be resized to the image size specified. 当您将设置属性的新值列表重新创建映像。When you set the property to a new value, the for the image list is recreated. 因为设置属性将导致句柄无法重新创建它，应设置之前设置属性。Because setting the property causes the handle to be recreated, you should set prior to setting the property. 时的句柄创建后，设置或在代码中之后设置, 的属性属性，将导致为设置的图像集合要删除的属性。When the handle for the has been created, setting the or properties in code, after setting the property, will cause the collection of images set for the property to be deleted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造，添加到图像属性，设置属性，并使用方法。The following code example demonstrates constructing an , adding images to the property, setting the property, and using the method. 若要运行此示例中，将其放在包含名为的按钮的窗体`Button1`。To run this example, place it in a form containing a button named `Button1`. 该示例假定存在`FeatherTexture.bmp`并`Gone Fishing.bmp`在 c:\Windows\\。The example assumes the existence of `FeatherTexture.bmp` and `Gone Fishing.bmp` at c:\Windows\\. 如果位图不存在于您的系统，或者在另一个位置存在，请相应地更改该示例。Change the example accordingly if the bitmaps do not exist on your system, or exist at another location. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是图像列表的数据部分。The is the data portion of the image list. 使用将本地化的窗体时，应始终添加和图像时窗体的语言属性设置为默认值。When you work with forms that will be localized, you should always add an and images when the Language property of a form is set to Default. 在添加映像会损坏的图像流之前，请更改窗体的语言。Changing the form's language before you add images will corrupt the image stream. 可以将此句柄传递给另一个实例的。You can pass this handle to another instance of an .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RecreateHandle As EventHandler

span.span: Occurs when the is recreated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此事件以进行特殊处理，何时操作，如更改以重新创建或。You can use this event to do special processing when the is recreated by actions such as changing the or . 因为设置，可能需要特殊处理或属性之后设置属性将导致句柄来重新创建和丢弃的图像。Special processing may be required because setting the or the property after setting the property causes the handle to be recreated and the images to be discarded. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ImageList1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ImageList1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#160](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#160)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#160](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#160)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绘制图像时，不被呈现的透明颜色。The transparent color is not rendered when the image is drawn.
